Package com.ultreon.bubbles.render.screen.gui

Class InputWidget

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.render.screen.gui.InputWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuiElement, StaticWidget
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractButton, Container, OptionsTextEntry, View
public abstract class InputWidget extends Object implements GuiElement, StaticWidget
Controllable widget, a widget that can be controlled by the user. This widget contains input event handlers like keyPress(int, char) and mouseClick(int, int, int, int)

    • mouseClick

      public boolean mouseClick(int x, int y, int button, int count)
      Handler for mouse clicking.
      Should only be overridden, and not called unless you know what you are doing.
      Parameters:
      x - the x position when clicked.
      y - the y position when clicked.
      button - the button used.
      count - the amount create sequential clicks.

    • keyPress

      public boolean keyPress(int keyCode, char character)
      Key press handler. Match a constant KeyInput.Map with the keyCode parameter for checking which key is pressed.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - the code for the key pressed.
      character - the character pressed.
      Returns:
      to cancel out other usage create this method.

    • keyRelease

      character - the character released.
      Returns:
      to cancel out other usage create this method.

      character - the character typed.
      Returns:
      to cancel out other usage create this method.
